fields.name: MySQL
fields.login_prompt:
Welcome to your DB Conservatory MySQL server! 
Type 'mysql' without the quotes and hit enter to connect to your database.
fields.long_description:
• Udacity database lesson
  • Learn SQL the hard way
fields.short_description: MySQL is the world's most popular open source database software, with over 100 million copies of its software downloaded or distributed throughout it's history.

fields.name: PostgreSQL
fields.login_prompt:
Welcome to your DB Conservatory PostgreSQL server!
Type 'psql' without the quotes and hit enter to connect to your database.
fields.long_description:
• Udacity database lesson
  • Learn SQL the hard way
fields.short_description: PostgreSQL is a powerful, open source object-relational database system. It has more than 15 years of active development and a strong reputation for reliability, data integrity, and correctness.

fields.name: MongoDB
fields.login_prompt:
Welcome to your DB Conservatory MongoDB server! 
Type 'mongo' without the quotes and hit enter to connect to your database.
fields.long_description:
• NoSQL explained
  • Getting started with MongoDB
fields.short_description: MongoDB (from "humongous") is an open-source document database, and the leading NoSQL database.

fields.name: CaBi
fields.short_description: Q4 2013 ride data from Capital Bikeshare, loaded into a MySQL database.
